In order to get to this area:

# Reach the Unnamed small island north of [[Dainichi Mikoshi]]. This can be accomplished by;
#*[[Gliding]] down by to the northmost waypoint on Dainichi Mikoshi
#*Or Gliding from the [[Ghostfish]] cluster at the far eastern side of [[The Narrows]]
# The northmost part of the small island will have a [[Phase Gate]] that will transport the Traveler to the Vishap Research Lab.
